thread.title: Hotel great - breakfast poor
thread.title_full: Hotel great - breakfast poor - Review of Comfotel Prpl, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DavePGlos
title: Hotel great - breakfast poor
text: You check in at hotel next door but it was great, chap very friendly and check in quick. . No room to swing a cat but cosy, well equipped, TV with digital channels and great bathroom. All going very well until breakfast. Tiny room compared to amount of guests, hardly any choice for example no bacon, sausages etc.. Wife had beans and egg and it was cold. Still gave 4 stars as the check in was so good and room so comfy. There is a cafe across the road so all good in the end.
